str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From sun and ballo; to combine, i.e. to converse, consult, dispute, to consider, to aid, to join, attack.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Assos, a port of Mysia, in the Roman province Asia. Probably of foreign origin; Assus, a city of Asia minor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To take up, raise; I pick up, take on board; I carry off, lead away. From ana and lambano; to take up.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural

str2: A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
For mutilene; Mitylene, a town on the island of Lesbos.
